text:
Voters services centres have been opened in Ariyalur and Jayamkondam Assembly segments in the district to enable voters to get duplicate copies of their electors photo identity cards (EPIC). Voters who have lost their EPICs or with damaged cards can get the duplicate copies from the service centres. Similarly, they can also get corrected or colour cards (instead of black and white ones). The copies would be issued on payment of Rs. 25. The centres have been opened at the Collector’s Office and offices of the Revenue Divisional Officer, Ariyalur, Taluk Office, Ariyalur, office of the Revenue Divisional Officer, Udayarpalayam and Taluk Office, Jayamkondam, Collector E. Saravanavelraj said in a press release.

Collector inspects

polling stations

All necessary basic amenities would be provided at the polling stations, Collector S. Ganesh said here on Tuesday. Mr.Ganesh, who inspected some of the polling stations, said that ramps, electricity supply, drinking water supply and toilets were being provided in all polling stations. No unauthorised person would be allowed inside the polling stations.
title: Duplicate EPIC
